entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:17 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 12:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -27.6°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Snow or ice pellets before morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:19 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
